maintainers.name: Oleksandr Halushko
maintainers.bio: I am professional software developer and I have been working with C++ across different industries for five years now. C++ is powerful (complex) language with huge potential and I like to explain and teach it to build a better world with faster software.

maintainers.name: Rohit Goswami
maintainers.bio: Applied High Performance Computing researcher based out of the University of Iceland with ties to IIT Kanpur. FOSS enthusiast for over ten years. C++, Lua, Nix, Fortran, R, and, anything fun.

maintainers.name: Sebastian Borza
maintainers.bio: I'm a Canadian (based in Chicago) golang, C and python developer working on projects within the gaming, finance and data-science worlds respectively. My favorite freetime task is coding challenges and I'm more than happy to help people talk through solutions!

maintainers.name: Silvano Cerza
maintainers.bio: I'm a C++ developer working mainly on desktop application, I have quite a bit of experience with Python and like to dabble in several other languages.

maintainers.name: J.R. "hiljusti" Hill
maintainers.bio: Build automation engineer at AWS by day, language enthusiast and tinkerer by night.
